name: csv-to-excel
title: CSV to Excel Converter
description: Convert CSV files to formatted Excel workbooks with auto-sized columns
content:
Overview

This application converts CSV (Comma-Separated Values) files into formatted Excel workbooks. Built using pandas and openpyxl, it automatically formats columns for better readability.

Features

  • Convert CSV to XLSX format
  • Automatic column width adjustment
  • Preserves data types and formatting
  • Clean, professional output

Parameters

  • CSV File: Upload your CSV file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates an Excel file (.xlsx) with the same base name as the input CSV file in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting data exports to Excel format
  • Creating formatted spreadsheets from raw CSV data
  • Preparing data for business reports
  • Sharing data in a more user-friendly format
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/python/csv_to_excel.py" "${csvPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
